Name: Spider shooting bee
About the game: This is a simple casual game Players need to control the spiders and destroy the bees that come. After the game starts, the bees will appear constantly from the right. The bee will fly from the right to the left. There are fast flying, flying slow. When the bee hits the spider, the game is over. Players want to control spiders and avoid bees It is also possible to fire bullets and eliminate bees. At the top of the screen, it shows how much time has passed and how many bees have been eliminated. Method of operation Control the spider movement with the mouse Where does the mouse move and where does the spider move? left mouse button After clicking, the spider will fire a bullet. 发送反馈 历史记录
